name: vybewhale-bot
description: A Telegram bot for crypto whale tracking and alerts using Vybe API

scripts.git-commit-push: git diff-index --quiet HEAD || (git add . && git commit -m "Something just got updated!" --allow-empty && git push origin main)
scripts.git-commit-push-force: git add . && git commit -m "Something just got updated!" --no-verify --allow-empty && git push origin main --force
